description: Episode of Series "For the juniors". An educational series aimed at 6-8 year olds which covers a variety of subject areas such as weather, transport, space, people and celebrations. This short video describes how the sun creates shadows on the ground and reflections on the water; how as the world rotates, the sun sets on one side of the world and rises on the other; and how people and animals use the sun differently. Suitable for children aged 3-7.
